titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the previously existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on: (1) 6-amino-1-naphthol-3-sulfonic acid; (2) 1-amino-2-chloro-4-hydroxyl-anthraquinone; and (3) 2-(4-amino-phenyl)-6-methyl-benzothiazole-7-sulfonic acid.
